name: CVE-2013-0074
description: Microsoft Silverlight 5, and 5 Developer Runtime, before 5.1.20125.0 does not properly validate pointers during HTML object rendering, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Silverlight application, aka "Silverlight Double Dereference Vulnerability."
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0.60818.0:rc:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0.60401.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0.60818.0:rc:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0.60401.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:-:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:-:x64:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0.60818.0:rc:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0.60401.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:macos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
